sentence: The teacher who was preparing the cookies for the children, who were orphans, [MASK] annoyed by the children.
The cats which were locked in a cage, which was occupying a room, [MASK] from Egypt.
The father who was next to the chairs, which were broken by his dogs, [MASK] tired.
The building which was under bridges, which were blocking rains, [MASK] the future presidential office.
The men who ran straight forward to a gym, which was owned by one of them, [MASK] athlethes.
The animals which were sleeping in the park, which was marked as a wild terrotory, [MASK] ferious.
The hunter who shot the lions, which were accentally released by the zookeepers, [MASK] tall.
The vases which were made by the company, that was in a forest, [MASK] making waves in the market.
The sheep which migrated to another prairie, which was close to a lake, [MASK] enjoying the grass.
The doctor who treated these patients, who were in serious injuries, [MASK] awareded a prize.
